website_summaries.verdict: Slightly older technology, but it does the job and is offered at a desirable price point.
pros: Has a triple receiving antenna design, that delivers an exact location quickly and reliably
Has multiple burial indicator lights, in case you're involved in a search for more than one person
Easier to use than some other avalanche beacons
cons: Doesn't have the latest technology, so it may not have all of the features you're seeking

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I gave my wife my old beacon. With zero training, using the Tracker 2, I was able to successfully locate and extract her from under a blanket on our sofa in no time.
customer_reviews.author: matthew Gratalo

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: liked the ease of use. been on two trips using it. battery change is simple. read all instructions before use. straps are comfortable. hope I never have to put it to use it! good piece of mind to have
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Worked great out West
customer_reviews.text: Worked great out West. 4 guys all purchased this and used it for safety. Luckily, no one had to be dug out :)
customer_reviews.author: C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Not new used opened box. Needs cleaned hopefully functions correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Was what I wanted, but didn’t expect it to be a opened box. There are signs of use. Just hoping it works as advertised. Not to worried about looks hopefully it saves a life if needed and doesn’t let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Kkingstonn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, I like how it clicks solidly into receive mode and has the option to automatically revert to transmit. Harness is comfortable, don't notice it's even there all day. It's also easy to read in bright light.
customer_reviews.author: G rider

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Tracked a beacon to within 6" buried ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Tracked a beacon to within 6" buried in snow.
customer_reviews.author: LAR

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son-in-law. He is an avid snowmobiler. They often go far into the back country to ride. Now his avalanche kit is complete
customer_reviews.author: michelle norton

customer_reviews.title: Smart design.
customer_reviews.text: In testing, I found no issues. The thing I like best about this unit is the simplicity of use. The send/receive switch is foolproof and the display works in any light.
customer_reviews.author: P Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great Beacon
customer_reviews.text: Used it in a test scenario only so far - but it worked and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Old Sully

customer_reviews.title: AS Described
customer_reviews.text: As described and arrived quickly. Hope to never know how well it works :)
customer_reviews.author: foutzio

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Small
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Small. Good battery life. Easy to use. Took my AST2 with this and had zero issues. Would recommend, and cheaper now that the 3rd gen is out.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: She let me know that it was absolutely perfect and a real necessity for her expedition
customer_reviews.text: This Avalanche Tracker/Transceiver was a gift for my daughter. She let me know that it was absolutely perfect and a real necessity for her expedition. She said she highly recommends it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Hass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it but hope I will never have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Good price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: itsme

customer_reviews.title: telemark skiier
customer_reviews.text: Compliments the backpack with shovel a necessity for telemak skiing. programed to find other beacons. Small easy to wear light weight.
customer_reviews.author: melinda sobel

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied that I bought this one.
customer_reviews.text: This Tracker2 Avalanche Beacon is quick and easy to use, the battery life is very good. Most importantly--PRACTICE often! Lee
customer_reviews.author: Lee C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this beacon. It can be updated. It is user friendly which is important in a stressful situation. Don't bother with the rest, this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Vickyfab

customer_reviews.title: Well...
customer_reviews.text: Seller was excellent. Quick delievery with a fair price. The product is built great! I have used it a couple time for practice but no review on using it for the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's new works seems to work fine haven't actually needed it yet , thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: JKK

customer_reviews.title: mandatory gear for venturing into avy zones
customer_reviews.text: Mandatory for backcountry winter travel. Snowmobiling, skiing, snowboarding, hiking, hunting - any time you venture into avalance exposed areas, you must have one of these with you. Do not die due to your own negligence and stupidity. These devices are easy to use, affordable and could save either you or a member of your party. Do not just buy one but learn how to use it. Practice finding hidden transceivers. The harness it comes with works well, although I use a different harness that also has a radio pouch. Transceiver, shovel and probe poles are all mandatory equipment for every member of your party. Cannot recommend highly enough as it could save your life.
customer_reviews.author: desertfox

customer_reviews.title: This beacon killed my family
customer_reviews.text: This beacon killed my whole family last spring....Then I had to go live with my grandma she died over thanksgiving but I can't tell anyone or I won't be able to keep cashing her social security checks
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: Backcountry Access Tracker 2 Avalanche Beacon
product_meta.description: FEATURES of the Backcountry Access Tracker2 Avalanche Beacon Rapid processor and simple user interface Real-time, digital display shows direction and distance Multiple burial indicator light Bright red LEDs (light emitting diodes) Uses three AAA alkaline batteries Includes a protective carrying case
feature_bullets: Rapid processor and simple user interface
